entry.name: floaters
entry.label: The windows (by class) that should float

entry.name: noBorder
entry.label: Should borders be removed? FocusUnderMouse recommended

entry.name: startAsMaster
entry.label: Put new windows in the master position

entry.name: layouts
entry.label: The layout configuration in "desktop:layoutname" format, separated with commas. Negative desktop denotes disabled tiling by default

entry.name: userActive
entry.label: Whether tiling is active by default

entry.name: gapSize
entry.label: The size in pixels of the gap between windows
